thought: The first step is to craft a white_carpet. This requires placing two wool side by side in the crafting grid, therefore I will move the wool from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: black_carpet

thought: Since I have placed the wool in slot 1, I can now craft the dye. This is done by smelting the wither_rose at slot 1 into the empty slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
